title: SQL / LINQ queries
subtitle: A collection of examples that demonstrate Language Integrated Query (LINQ) in C#.
description: Language Integrated Query (LINQ) is a Microsoft .NET Framework component that adds language-level data querying capabilities.
description2: The purpose of this project is to demonstrate the use of LINQ in C# by querying data from a Microsoft's 'Northwind' sample database. The project includes a WPF application that allows the user to query data from a SQLite database (and a SQL Server database if you decide to configure it that way).
description3: Alternatively, the project can be used as a template for any C# WPF application where you plan to use LINQ as it is structured in a way that allows for easy modification and configuration.

title: Chess
subtitle: A chess engine written in C#. Includes sample applications.
description: This project contains a chess engine written in C# that has all of the features to play a full game of chess. I began developing this as a school project which I eventually presented in my final year. Even though the project is essentially complete, I still continue to work on it and add new features as I find it to be a great way to learn new things. The project includes a console application and desktop application with UDP multiplayer capabilities.
description2: During the time that I spend developing this project while I was in school, I gained knowledge of many object-oriented programming principles. The pieces are abstracted into their own classes with their own unique movement logic. The board is a 2d array of pieces and is responsible for validating moves, checking for checkmate, and other game-related logic.

title: market.io
subtitle: A web platform where users can buy and list items, real estate, jobs, etc.
